text: under sexual model I started with
kung-fu when I was 14 I used to copy
Bruce Lee's tactics by watching his
films I even learned to use the nunchaku
this way sort of as I wanted to level
one Bruce Lee was my hero when I was
growing up I used to dream about him and
have becoming a second Bruce Lee for my
people I saw sluggish from a lot our
marquee accent when I posted photos in
facebook people started talking about my
similarity with Bruce Lee when I looked
at those photos and those of Bruce Lee I
actually could see the similarity which
is why I changed my facebook name to
Bruce ethera which is like Bruce Afghan
I think brutally was a role model as an
athlete and as a character I may not be
Bruce Lee but I'll follow his footsteps
as long as I live
